name: ROCKHEADS
description:
Tired of those damn noisy Dwarves mining day and night, disturbing your peaceful RPG town? Take control of their Bombs and Winch, and detonate the damned little grubby-bearded rockheads!

This is Breakout/Arkanoid except stages are populated by annoying Dwarves that will repair broken blocks, and your ball is a Bomb. There are also drill hazards *ahem* inspired by Shovel Knight Dig.

Explode, or otherwise deal with, as many Dwarves as possible - watch out for little drills, big drills, buzzsaws, and the reverse-winch-controls lever...
